name: Camp of the Dead
description:
You got lost in the forest! You had a radio here, but it's all broken up! Pick up the pieces to call for help. Avoid any danger nearby...

Instructions

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to Move
  • Shift to run
  • J to Attack
  • Space to Jump
  • Hide behind objects!
  • Get all radio pieces to win!

Credits

  • Remtaine as programmer
  • Nebelstern as graphics artist
  • Janusz as SFX artist
  • Apmus as composer

Game Jam

  • Made for the Screamortality Game Jam
  • Main Theme: Birth, Death, Rebirth
  • Optional Theme: Infinity
